data.title: Hadi Cahyadi – Helios Capital Asia
data.text:
Hadi Cahyadi is the Founder and Managing Partner of Helios Capital. He holds a doctorate degree in Research Management from Universitas Pelita Harapan, Jakarta; a masters’ degree in Business Administration from University of Houston, Texas; a masters’ degree in Corporate Law from RMIT, Melbourne; and a bachelor’s degree in Accounting from Universitas Tarumanagara, Jakarta. Hadi started his career as an auditor at a “Big-5” accounting firm and spent years in international public accounting firms including Arthur Andersen, Jakarta; Deloitte, Jakarta; KPMG – Corporate Recovery, Melbourne; and EY, Jakarta. Since then, he has accumulated over 25 years of extensive experience in diverse engagement such as M&A, Capital Raising, Debt Restructuring, Corporate Recovery, Due Diligence, and Business Valuation.

Academic Qualifications:

Doctor of Management – Universitas Pelita Harapan, Jakarta, 2021

MCL – RMIT, Melbourne, 1999

MBA – University of Houston, Clear Lake, Texas, 1993

Bachelor in Accounting – Universitas Tarumanagara, Jakarta, 1990
